dcterms:creator: Janet Blake
Lucas Lixinski
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of the text of the 2003 UNESCO Convention for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage, which is analyzed to explore the institutional design and the roles of various actors within the framework of cultural heritage relations.
dcterms:title: 2003 UNESCO Convention for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage

dcterms:creator: Christopher K. Frantz
Saba Siddiki
dcterms:description: Institutional Grammar (IG) is a method used for extracting and analyzing institutional design from legal texts, providing a structured way to understand norms, rules, and actors.
dcterms:title: Institutional Grammar (IG)

dcterms:creator: Douglas Rice
Saba Siddiki
Seth Frey
Jay H. Kwon
Adam Sawyer
dcterms:description: The IG Parser is a tool designed for machine coding of policy texts using Institutional Grammar, facilitating the extraction of structured data from legal documents.
dcterms:title: IG Parser

dcterms:creator: Tanya Heikkila
Christopher M. Weible
dcterms:description: This dataset includes network metrics derived from IG data, providing insights into the polycentricity of governance structures.
dcterms:title: Network metrics from IG data

dcterms:creator: Batoul Mesdaghi
Amineh Ghorbani
Mark de Bruijne
dcterms:description: This dataset analyzes institutional dependencies in climate adaptation related to transport infrastructures, employing an institutional network analysis approach.
dcterms:title: Institutional dependencies in climate adaptation of transport infrastructures

dcterms:creator: Tom√°s Olivier
dcterms:description: This dataset represents IG data transformed into network data, allowing for the analysis of institutional design and collective-action problems.
dcterms:title: IG data transformed into network data

dcterms:creator: Amineh Ghorbani
Saba Siddiki
Batoul Mesdaghi
Maja Bosch
Yared Abebe
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on institutional compliance in flood risk management, utilizing a network analysis approach to understand compliance dynamics.
dcterms:title: Institutional compliance in flood risk management
